name: Bond memorial library
text: The public library operated and maintained in Kohala, North Kohala, county of Hawaii, formerly under the name of Kohala Public Library shall be designated and known as the "Bond Memorial Library". [L 1921, c 63, §1; RL 1925, §421; RL 1935, §804; RL 1945, §1915; am L 1951, c 190, pt of §1; RL 1955, §45-10; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §18; HRS ]
